title: Strengthening Business Practice Competencies: Practical Guidelines for Engineering Education Research Paper Writing

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic research paper structure and overview of research methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain how to structure titles, abstracts, and keywords according to standard academic paper formats
Learners can write abstracts that clearly communicate research objectives within a 150-250 word range
Learners can apply effective academic expression techniques that engage readers to practical case studies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
